extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update affected products to V3.1.2.1 or later versions to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Redundancy
extracted_playbook.description: Disable redundancy if it is not used to reduce risk.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to Trusted IPs
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict access to the affected systems to trusted IP addresses only.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, following CISA's guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA's guidance on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
